channel.title: Posts on Ruben Schmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ruben Schmidt

item.title: First post!
item.description: I have decided to start writing. Why do you ask? Well, the main reason is that I want to summarize, structurize and share my learnings. During my studies, I wrote tons of summaries. Everything I needed to remember I wrote down. I have found that I learn a lot better when I write things down and try to summarize what I just read, in a way that I can understand when coming back to it later.
